text.text: Spring has begun, flowers and trees blossom, and your fields are ready to be cultivated and sown.

text.name: SS_SEASON_INTRO_1
text.text: Summer has begun, the days are long. It is time to make hay and watch the crops grow.

text.name: SS_SEASON_INTRO_2
text.text: Autumn has begun, the winter is coming, the leaves are turning. Your fields are ready to harvest.

text.name: SS_SEASON_INTRO_3
text.text: Winter has fallen, the ground is frozen, and you can't work the fields. It is time to rest and tend to your animals

text.name: dialog_applySettings
text.text: Are you sure you want to change the Seasons settings? Changes to season length can result in fields that will only repair after one game-year.

text.name: dialog_resetGrowth
